text.text_translated:
More than 4,000 people climbed to the top of Everest. They were between 13 and 80 years old. Climbing high mountains is very dangerous because of cold weather and bad storms. But the best climbers in the world still want new things to do.

Gerlinde Kaltenbrunner is from Austria. She loved climbing mountains when she was young. After school, she worked as a nurse. But she still climbed mountains in her free time.
